hotels.title: Hawaii Coastal Bliss near Golden Beaches with Five Restaurants, Outdoor Pool & Spa
hotels.description: Sat along Hawaii's striking Kohala Coast, Fairmont Orchid is a tropical oasis brimming with island charm. This oceanfront haven boasts breathtaking views of swaying palms and beaches you can only dream of. Dive into the 10,000-square-foot lagoon pool, rejuvenate at the unique Spa Without Walls, or perfect your swing at the 45-hole golf course. Adventure awaits at every turn, from snorkelling with sea turtles in the crystal-clear bay to paddleboarding under the Hawaiian sun. Savour Pacific Rim cuisine across five restaurants and three Polynesian-style bars. With the Mauna Kea volcano as your backdrop and ancient petroglyph fields nearby, this resort is your gateway to discovering Big Island.
